FileFormat.FormatDescription: CorelDraw (styled CorelDRAW) is a vector graphics editor developed and marketed by Corel Corporation of Ottawa, Canada. It is also the name of Corel's Graphics Suite, which bundles CorelDraw with bitmap-image editor Corel Photo-Paint as well as other graphics-related programs.
FileFormat.ProvenanceName: Museum of London / Museum of London
FileFormat.ProvenanceDescription: This format can be identified in DROID 6 and later via a container signature. 11/2023 (v.115)- Container signature added. Modified the offset values in the internal signature from null to 0 as part of a project to match PRONOM data with the xsd standard. Submitted by Brigham Young University and internally researched.

InternalSignature.SignatureNote: PK{48}RIFF (little-endian) or RIFX (big-endian){4}CDRF (F=15 although referred to as version X5)
